General.Name: ILCoin Token
General.Description: ILCOIN is a cryptocurrency developed by R&G GmbH. It is mined using SHA-256 Proof-of-Work (POW) technology. ILCOIN wants to evolve and become the foundation of a new, global digital currency-based economic system. Members of this system may earn, accumulate, spend and trade ILCoins for the benefit of themselves and the entire community.

ICO.Description:
ILCOIN is a cryptocurrency developed by R&G GmbH. It is mined using SHA-256 Proof-of-Work (POW) technology. ILCOIN wants to evolve and become the foundation of a new, global digital currency-based economic system. Members of this system may earn, accumulate, spend and trade ILCoins for the benefit of themselves and the entire community.

Team:

  • Geza Kapitany: Co-founder.
  • Edgar López: Lead Developer.
  • Luisa Noriega: Chief Technology Officer.

ILCOIN will be holding its ICO on the 15th of November, 2017. The ICO token supply represents 92% of the total token supply. The ICO funding target is 2060 BTC, there is no funding cap and is expected to end on the 15th of December, 2017. ILCOIN ICO will feature a bonus campaign.

Token Reserve Split:

  • 92% Pre-Sale and ICO;
  • 08% Team;
